song.title: Blood
song.lyrics:
Spin me round, roll me over, fuckin' circus Stab it down, one-way needle, pulled so slowly
Drains and spills, soaks the pages, fills their sponges
It's my blood It's my blood
Paint Ed big...turn Ed into... one of his enemies...
It's my blood It's my blood It's my blood
Stab it down, fill the pages, suck my fuckin' life out, man
Maker of my enemies...
Take...my...
